title: Nusa Lembongan Beachside Escape with Daily Dining, Nightly Drinks & Roundtrip Boat Transfers
description:
Tucked among coconut trees and porcelain sands is the vibrant Lembongan Beach Club and Resort, a hidden gem on the island of Nusa Lembongan. Accessible from the mainland by speedboat, the resort offers everything you need for the ultimate beachside escape, including a spectacular pool overlooking the shimmering ocean, an onsite restaurant specialising in both international and Thai favourites, Tjendana Spa and a beach club offering a host of fabulous beach activities, including stand-up paddling, canoeing and snorkelling.

There's no denying this is the perfect base to explore Nusa Lembongan. Introduce yourself to the region’s giant manta rays with a snorkelling session, hang five on the region’s famous surf beaches or simply sit back and take in the stunning Indonesian sunset with a cocktail in hand.
offer_address: Jalan Jungut Batu Beach Nusa Lembongan, Jungutbatu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 87500, Indonesia

title: Nusa Lembongan Beachfront Escape with Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover a tranquil and serene side of Indonesia: venture to the island of Nusa Lembongan, located a quick, 35-minute boat ride from Sanur. Embrace the laid-back vibes of this picturesque destination at Mahagiri Resort, a beachfront paradise sitting on the largest white-sand beach on the island, where you will enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a daily beer or mocktail per person, a lunch during your stay, and return fast boat transfers from Sanur harbour.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Banjar Kaja Desa Jungutbatu, Nusa Lembongan, Nusapenida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia

vendor_name: The Tamarind Resort Nusa Lembongan by ​​Préférence
title: Romantic Escape to Lembongan Island with Return Boat Transfers
description: Plan the honeymoon of a lifetime or a romantic holiday with a loved one at the stunning The Tamarind Resort Nusa Lembongan by Préférence, an exclusive resort on the southeast coast of Bali, Nusa Lembongan island. Arrive in style with return shared boat transfers from Sanur pier in Bali included in your escape. Also includes a complimentary upgrade to a stunning ocean-view Atapa Room from your very own private balcony; inclusive daily à la carte breakfast, one two-course dinner for two, a daily beer or mocktail each, one time massage per person and more.
location_description: The Tamarind Resort Nusa Lembongan by ​​Préférence
offer_address: Nusa Lembongan, Jl. Jungutbatu No.1, Jungutbatu, Nusapenida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia

vendor_name: Adiwana d'Nusa Beach Club and Resort
title: Nusa Lembongan Beachfront Retreat with Return Transfers from Bali
description:
Just off the southeast coast of Bali is Nusa Lembongan, a palm-fringed Indonesian island beloved for its raw beauty and excellent surfing. Embrace complete serenity and savour the laid-back vibes of this picturesque destination, staying at the beachfront Adiwana d'Nusa Beach Club and Resort. Discover what makes this resort a tropical dream escape as you enjoy daily buffet breakfast, daily afternoon tea, one three-course dinner, a complimentary daily beer each per day and return ferry transfers from Bali.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
location_description: Adiwana d'Nusa Beach Club and Resort
offer_address: Jl. Jungutbatu Nusa Lembongan Nusa Penida 87500 Indonesi

vendor_name: The Tamarind Resort Nusa Lembongan by ​​Préférence
title: Indonesia: Romantic Nusa Lembongan Island Escape with Rooftop Bar, Three Pools & Tranquil Day Spa
description: Plan the holiday of a lifetime at the stunning The Tamarind Resort Nusa Lembongan, an Indonesian island escape just a short boat ride from Bali. Relish delicious meals at Indica restaurant, watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand at the rooftop bar, and reach new heights of relaxation with a tranquil treatment at Amlika Spa or a dip in one of the three onsite pools.
offer_address: Nusa Lembongan, Jl. Jungutbatu No.1, Jungutbatu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung  80771, Bali

title: Peaceful Nusa Lembongan Tropical Retreat with Holistic Spa & Poolside Restaurant
description:
Escape to the serene shores of Nusa Lembongan to discover this boutique collection of 26 suites and villas, all designed to embrace Bali's natural beauty. This island paradise offers a quieter, more relaxed pace of life, providing the perfect base from which explore the stunning crystal-clear waters of Mushroom Bay and breathtaking views from Devil's Tear.

When you're not out exploring, retreat to the hotel's luxurious facilities. Take a dip in the sparkling infinity pool, indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at Acala Spa, or savour a delicious meal at the hotel's Jala Restaurant, which serves a mix of local and international cuisine. For a unique dining experience, venture to the nearby Sandy Bay Beach Club, renowned for its fresh seafood and stunning sunset views.
offer_address: Jalan Ancak Sari, No. 277, Banjar Ancak, Nusa Lembongan, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771

title: Barefoot Nusa Lembongan Beachfront Oasis with Greek Island-Inspired Villas
description:
Experience a place where whitewashed, Greek island-style villas tumble down the hillside and emerald waves sparkle under the sun at Batu Karang Lembongan Resort & Spa. Tucked away on the island paradise of Nusa Lembongan, just a 30-minute ferry ride off the coast of Bali, this tranquil resort will put you under its spell with direct views over Mount Agung and impossibly turquoise waters.

Dip your toes in one of three pools, stroll along the unspoiled shores of Jungut Batu Beach at sunset and perhaps enjoy a sundowner at the famous speakeasy, The Howff Whiskey, Gin & Wine Bar, or the waterfront The Deck Café & Bar. Be swept up in the magic of this top-rated resort - stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2020 - as you discover the island’s popular surf breaks, kaleidoscopic waters and neighbouring islands, before returning to Muntigs Bar & Restaurant for a bite to eat.
offer_address: Jungutbatu, Nusapenida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
